solution_line_template: The cost of one card from each box in total is {first_box_card_cost}+{second_box_card_cost}=<<{first_box_card_cost}+{second_box_card_cost}={cost_per_pair}>>{cost_per_pair} dollars.
The total cost of cards the boy bought is {cost_per_pair}*{num_cards_per_box}=<<{cost_per_pair}*{num_cards_per_box}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} dollars.
